item.title: VITA-1.5: Towards GPT-4o Level Real-Time Vision and Speech Interaction
item.description: VITA-1.5 achieves near real-time vision and speech interaction by using a novel three-stage training method that progressively integrates speech data into an LLM, enabling fluent conversations.
